title: Ticket #2372: make man page for condor_gather_info
description:
Original ticket and version history says that we needed a man page for 7.5.6. Certainly, the tool is in the release, so we do need a man page, even if further changes are planned.

For lack of a better procedure, initializing assignment of this ticket to Pete, the ticket owner of #1664.
remarks:
2011-Sep-07 16:49:17 by kronenfe:
I changed the usage of this script slightly today. There are now two different modes:

1) condor_gather_info

This is the new one. In this mode no job information is gathered. A temporary staging area is not needed, and a tarball is not generated. Instead, a single file is put into the current working directory - condor-profile.txt.

This contains the Condor and machine information. I also expanded on the information gathered.

2) condor_gather_info --jobid <ID> [ <other options> ]

This works like before.

-scot

2011-Oct-06 12:03:57 by psilord:
I wrote the man page and put it into the master. Should be available for 7.7.3.
